## Genshin Card

**‌MiHoYo Game Statistics Card Generator.**

[![ref-repo]](https://replit.com/@qhy040404/Genshin-Card)
[![ref-online-tool]](https://hoyocard.qhy04.com/)
[![ref-official-doc]](https://hoyocard.qhy04.com/)

### Parameters

<details >
<summary><small>Click to show/close parameters</small></summary><p></p>

| Name | Type | Required | Default | Description | More Description |
| -------------------- | -------------------- | ------------------------ | ----------------------- | --------------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| ![ref-params] | | | | | |
| `gameName` | `string` | `true` |  | Game Name | Supported: `hi3` (Honkai Impact 3), `ys` (Genshin Impact), `sr` (Honkai: Star Rail), `zzz` (Zenless Zone Zero). |
| `bgImageId` | `string` | `true` |  | Background Image ID | Format: `rand` (Random), `1,2-4` (`,` split, `-` range, result is `1,2,3,4`). More images reference: [hoyo-card-assets](https://github.com/qhy040404/hoyo-card-assets). |
| `miyousheUID` | `string` | `true` |  | Miyoushe UID | Please make sure that you have enabled the public display of personal information on Miyoushe. |

</details>

```txt
https://hoyocard.qhy04.com/{gameName}/{bgImageId}/{miyousheUID}.png
```

<p align="right"><a href="#readme-top"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Back%20to%20top-555555?style=for-the-badge"></a></p>

### Examples

```markdown
<!-- qhy040404 -->
![Genshin Impact](https://hoyocard.qhy04.com/gs/detail/rand/318490747.png)
```

<div>
  <img src="https://hoyocard.qhy04.com/gs/detail/rand/318490747.png" alt="Genshin Impact" />
</div>

```markdown
<!-- qhy040404 -->
![Honkai: Star Rail](https://hoyocard.qhy04.com/sr/detail/rand/318490747.png)
```

  <img src="https://hoyocard.qhy04.com/sr/detail/rand/318490747.png" alt="Honkai: Star Rail" />
</div>
